item.title: Re: Village Invasion/Raiding Guide?
item.content:encoded:
There's not really anything to it.

You click on "Attack Other Villages". You'll see a list of all the villages that your village currently has a spy in. If one of those is currently set as the invasion target, when you attack, you'll take resources and ryo. If the target isn't set as an invasion target, you'll only take ryo. Both will cause your village to lose it's spy.

The spy must be planted 24 hours in advance (though there may be a Science function that reduces this).

Each person can only attack once a day (unless they have Regalia, then it's two). It costs 50 stamina each time.

The kage can change the invasion target once a day by default, and there are some upgrades and potions that increase the number of times you can change the target.

That's all there is to it.
